sentence.Network_en: Frontispiece: Illustration on the page facing the title page of a book.
sentence.Network_cn: 卷首插图: 和扉页照面的页上插图.

list.abs: 沪江词库精选frontispiece title是什么意思、英语短语。frontispiece title怎么翻译: 扉页书名相关短语: frontispiece title 扉页书名.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): from French frontispice or late Latin frontispicium 'facade', from Latin frons, front- 'front' + specere 'to look'. The change in the ending (early in the word's history) was by association with piece

entry.tran: (书籍中与扉页相对的)卷首插图，扉画
entry.def: The frontispiece of a book is a picture at the beginning, opposite the page with the title on.

means.word_mean: 2. front illustration facing the title page of a book
